short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays current Matic token price on the badge icon. Several exchanges and currencies available.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
View the current Matic token price at a glance. Refreshes every (1/5/10/20/30 seconds)
Badge color indicates current price trend.

Supported exchanges: Kraken, Coinbase, Binance, HitBtc 
Supported currencies: USD, EUR, GBP
